timeline.bodyText:
A question:
I always have "Show hidden files" on my Windows computers so I see the .git folder. But I suppose normal users won't. Maybe it would be good to add a comment about that specific folder. Something like "The .git folder is usually hidden. Ensure that you copy also the hidden folders in the folder".
timeline.author: danielb987
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -181,6 +165,28 @@
  • Preferences ‑> Locations ‑> User Files Location and set it to the JMRI folder you created in Dropbox.
    • + +

    Sneaker Net

    + + First, copy the entire directory from one of your + computers to the USB stick. This will be a master that you're moving + around. (You can also directly `git clone` onto the USB stick.)
